data.meanings: to treat badly, do evil to disgrace, be evil/wicked/vicious, ill, anything that makes a person sad and sorrowful, bad action, mischief and corruption, sin, evil doer, wretched or grievous, vex, annoy. su'atun (pl. suat) - corpse, external portion of both sexes, shame.
data.sentence: The word فَسَاءَ comes from the root س و ا and is associated with the meanings: to treat badly, do evil to disgrace, be evil/wicked/vicious, ill, anything that makes a person sad and sorrowful, bad action, mischief and corruption, sin, evil doer, wretched or grievous, vex, annoy. su'atun (pl. suat) - corpse, external portion of both sexes, shame.

data.meanings: sky, rain, shower, went quickly or hastened.
data.sentence: The word وَأَمْطَرْنَا comes from the root م ط ر and is associated with the meanings: sky, rain, shower, went quickly or hastened.

data.meanings: sky, rain, shower, went quickly or hastened.
data.sentence: The word مَطَرًا comes from the root م ط ر and is associated with the meanings: sky, rain, shower, went quickly or hastened.

data.meanings: (Nun-Thal-Ra) to dedicate, make a vow, warn, admonish, caution, promise voluntarily, offer present. nadhiir - warner, one who informs and averts calamity, who cautions and put one on guard.
data.sentence: The word الْمُنْذَرِينَ comes from the root ن ذ ر and is associated with the meanings: (Nun-Thal-Ra) to dedicate, make a vow, warn, admonish, caution, promise voluntarily, offer present. nadhiir - warner, one who informs and averts calamity, who cautions and put one on guard.

data.meanings: sky, rain, shower, went quickly or hastened.
data.sentence: The word مَطَرُ comes from the root م ط ر and is associated with the meanings: sky, rain, shower, went quickly or hastened.
